articles.title: Bengal education scam accused Partha Chatterjee turns to religion in jail
articles.description: Partha Chatterjee is reading books on Indian mystic Ramakrishna Paramahamsa while spending time in jail, sources told India Today.
articles.content:
Former Bengal minister Partha Chatterjee, who was arrested for his involvement in an alleged teacher's recruitment scam has turned to religion during his time in jail, sources told India Today.
